Header.title: Centralized Placement Cell
Header.paragraph: The Centralized Placement Cell at Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya offers all placements and career related details and solutions at one place.

About.paragraph: Among the elite technology institutes of the country, DAVV Indore embodies technology, research, and development in the purest form. DAVV Indore boasts of a unique hands-on curriculum, creme de la creme of students who epitomize all-around proficiency in technical and professional matters. All the Placement-associated activities are handled by the institute’s Training and Placement Cell (T&P Cell). The T&P consists of T&P Officer, Faculty Members, Student Placement Committee & student volunteers working round the clock to provide the best possible services to the visiting organizations.
About.paragraph2: Among the elite technology institutes of the country, DAVV Indore embodies technology, research, and development in the purest form. DAVV Indore boasts of a unique hands-on curriculum, creme de la creme of students who epitomize all-around proficiency in technical and professional matters. All the Placement-associated activities are handled by the institute’s Training and Placement Cell (T&P Cell). The T&P consists of T&P Officer, Faculty Members, Student Placement Committee & student volunteers working round the clock to provide the best possible services to the visiting organizations.

Services.name: Unified Industry Connect
Services.text: Acts as a central hub for all affiliated institutes, building strong relationships with top recruiters across diverse sectors.

Services.name: Holistic Student Development
Services.text: Offers training in soft skills, aptitude, technical interviews, and group discussions to prepare students for corporate readiness.

Services.name: Consistent Placement Drives
Services.text: Regularly organizes campus placement drives, pooled recruitments, and career expos in collaboration with reputed organizations.

Services.name: Data-Driven Insights
Services.text: Maintains placement records, trends, and analytics to guide students and optimize strategies for future opportunities.

Services.name: Customized Company Engagement
Services.text: Aligns student strengths with specific company requirements to ensure better role fit and successful hiring outcomes.

Services.name: Inclusive and Transparent Process
Services.text: Ensures equal opportunities for students across all disciplines, following a transparent and merit-based selection process.

Testimonials.text: "We believe in nurturing talent and connecting it with the right opportunities. Our goal is to make every student industry-ready."
Testimonials.name: Dr. Rakesh Singhai (Vice-Chancellor DAVV)

Testimonials.text: "“At CPC DAVV, we ensure equal access to placement support for all affiliated institutes. Excellence is our shared mission."
Testimonials.name: Dr. Govind Maheshwari

Testimonials.text: "We strive to bridge the gap between academia and industry. Our initiatives empower students for dynamic careers ahead."
Testimonials.name: Dr. Suresh Patidar

Testimonials.text: "Beyond placements, we focus on shaping confident professionals. Skill-building and mentorship remain at our core."
Testimonials.name: Dr. Nitin Nagar

Testimonials.text: "Collaboration with top recruiters is our strength. We are committed to expanding our industry network each year"
Testimonials.name: Mr. Avnish Vyas

Testimonials.text: "CPC is more than a placement cell—it’s a vision for inclusive growth. We work tirelessly to uplift every student’s career path"
Testimonials.name: Dr. Nishikant Waikar
